courseWork.title: Chapter 10 Workbook Upload A Picture of  completed work.
courseWork.description:
Independent Work No zoom

Work through the chapter 10 workbook pages 
Take a picture of the completed work to upload to Math Google Classroom assignment for participation grade in Math.

Workbook pages: 

10.1 = pages 67 & 68 (see pages 117 - 118 in textbook for examples)

10.2 = pages 69 & 70 (See pages 121 - 122 in textbook for examples)

10.3 = pages 71 to 74 (see pages 125 - 126 in textbook for examples)

courseWork.title: 5/21 Chapter 10.1 & 10.2 Draw the Room assingment
courseWork.description:
Directions: 
Use the sheet, along with Chapter 10.1 & 10.2 in your textbook. Practice observing the different types of lines throughout your house. Lines can include perpendicular, parallel, rays, segments, and intersecting lines. On the next page draw and label 6 different line types that you find around your house. 
When you finish take a picture of your drawing page and upload it to this assignment.
courseWork.descriptionHtml:

courseWork.description:

Submit when you are done

courseWork.title: Chapter 9.1 understanding and measuring angles - Scavenger Hunt
courseWork.description:
Pages 85 - 86 Textbook 
Workbook pages 45 - 46

Scavenger Hunt - Print the attached scavenger hunt template (or use a piece of paper to draw a copy of it)
Go through your house, yard or wherever you are, and find 4 or more of each kind of angle. Draw and label each kind of angle you found. 
When you are done please take a picture and upload it to this assignment.
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
Pages 85 - 86 Textbook
Workbook pages 45 - 46

Scavenger Hunt - Print the attached scavenger hunt template (or use a piece of paper to draw a copy of it)
Go through your house, yard or wherever you are, and find 4 or more of each kind of angle. Draw and label each kind of angle you found.
When you are done please take a picture and upload it to this assignment.

comments.comment: Loved seeing your scavenger hunts kiddos.  Have a great weekend.
comments.commentHtml: Loved seeing your scavenger hunts kiddos. Have a great weekend.

form.title: Chapter 9 Recall Prior Knowledge & Quick Check.
Chapter 8 Assessment: Adding & Subtracting Decimals Part 1:

courseWork.title: Chapter 8 Assessment: Adding & Subtracting Decimals
courseWork.description:
This is independent work
I will host the zoom meeting while you take the assessment.  
You may use your Math textbook to look at strategies and tips on chapter 8 lessons. 
You will need scratch paper to solve the problems before you answer.  Show all of your work as if you were taking the test on paper in class. 
There is no using a calculator, Google Searching, or using any other resources
There is no chatting via text, computer, or other devices with students from class.
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
This is independent work
I will host the zoom meeting while you take the assessment.
You may use your Math textbook to look at strategies and tips on chapter 8 lessons.
You will need scratch paper to solve the problems before you answer. Show all of your work as if you were taking the test on paper in class.
There is no using a calculator, Google Searching, or using any other resources
There is no chatting via text, computer, or other devices with students from class.

Chapter 8.2 Subtracting Decimals in tenths and hundredths

courseWork.title: Chapter 8.2 Subtracting Decimals in tenths and hundredths
courseWork.description:
11:3 - 12:30

Chapter 8.2 Subtracting decimals up to two places. This Lesson Takes 2 days (Day 2)

Read and work through Textbook pages 65 - 71

Practice in Workbook pages 29 - 30

See Math Google Classroom to complete for this assignment from textbook page 71 the "Let's Practice" page in the textbook

** Optional - Reteach pages 75 - 90 ( will post these in Math google classroom if you want more practice)**

Videos to Help: https://www.khanacademy.org/math/arithmetic/arith-decimals/arith-review-sub-decimals/v/strategies-for-subtracting-more-complex-decimals-with-tenths 

https://www.khanacademy.org/math/arithmetic/arith-decimals/arith-review-sub-decimals/v/more-advanced-subtraction-strategies-with-hundredths 

Step by Step to help: http://studyjams.scholastic.com/studyjams/jams/math/decimals-percents/add-sub-decimals.htm

These are the questions from page 71 in the textbook

Adding and Subtracting Decimals

Chapter opener Students add and subtract decimals by using the same algorithms as whole numbers. - Students Add & Subtract decimals using the same algorithm as whole numbers

courseWork.title: Student Led Conference Slide
courseWork.description:
Good Day 4th graders!
We are ready to showcase what we have been learning so far this year to your parents!
Click the attachment...BUT you have to make your own copy to save and post here so it isn't mixed with someone else's presentation!
1 - Click the Link
2 - Click File
3 - Click Make a Copy
4 - On your Copy Title it with your First and Last Name
5 - You may begin working on your Slide show!
courseWork.descriptionHtml:
Good Day 4th graders!
We are ready to showcase what we have been learning so far this year to your parents!
Click the attachment...BUT you have to make your own copy to save and post here so it isn't mixed with someone else's presentation!
1 - Click the Link
2 - Click File
3 - Click Make a Copy
4 - On your Copy Title it with your First and Last Name
5 - You may begin working on your Slide show!
